Susan Shabangu (28 Febụwarị 1956) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa bụ onye otu ndị omeiwu na-anọchite anya African National Congress kemgbe ọnwa Mee 1994. Ọ nọbu n'ọkwa Minista nke Mmepe Ọha. Tupu nke ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Ụmụ nwanyị na Presidency, nke Onye isi ala Jacob Zuma guzobere n'ọnwa Mee 2014. Ọ bụ Minista nke Mineral Resources site n'afọ 2009 ruo afọ 2014.
Susan Shabangu gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Madibane High School na Soweto n'afọ 1977.

Tupu a họpụta ya na gọọmentị, Shabangu na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'òtù ndị ọrụ.  Site n'afọ 1980 ruo afọ 1985, ọ bụ osote odeakwụkwọ maka Federation of South African Women (FEDSAW).  Ọ bụkwa onye otu Federation of Transvaal Women (FEDTRAW)
N'afọ 1981, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu Anti-Republic Campaign Committee
N'afọ 1982, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Kọmitii Mgbasa Ozi Mandela
N'afọ 1984-85 ọ haziri Amalgamated Black Workers Project
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Kansụl Ụlọ Ọrụ ma bụrụ onye nhazi ụmụ nwanyị nke Transport and General Workers Union (T&GWU)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na National Women's Sub-committee nke Congress of South African Trade Unions (COSATU).
